document.heading: Office of Employee Appeals Attorney Fees Clarification Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-166, the “Office of Employee Appeals Attorney Fees Clarification Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-29, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 2002, and April 9, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 30, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-355 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-166 became effective on June 28, 2002.
